select article.id, article.public_time, manager.username as authorname, article.view, article.title, article.content, ac.name as categoryName, article.ac_id as categoryId, article.gmt_modified as gmtModified, article.gmt_create as gmtCreate
from article left join article_category as ac on article.ac_id = ac.id left join manager on article.author_id = manager.id where article.id = #{id}

select article.id, article.public_time, manager.username as authorname, article.view, article.title, article.content, '招生计划' as categoryName, article.ac_id as categoryId, article.gmt_modified as gmtModified, article.gmt_create as gmtCreate from article join manager on article.author_id = manager.id where ac_id = (select id from article_category where name = '招生简章')
